  .banner-grid-vvd .logo {
    width: 765px;
    margin: 4rem auto;
  }

  .banner-grid-vvd .text {
    font-size: 3rem;
    line-height: 2.5rem;
    letter-spacing: -0.02em;
    /* margin: 2rem 0 7rem; */
  }

      max-width: 800px;
    }

    .banner-grid-vvd .text {
      font-size: 2.5rem;
      line-height: 3rem;
    }
  }

      width: 536px;

      margin: 1.5rem 0 4rem;
    }

silhouette. A discreet, spotlight-like light enhances textures without overpowering them. <br><br>Stainless steel brings precision and sobriety. This material introduces a contemporary character that blends harmoniously with any texture or finish, elevating each piece with a refined and timeless style. <br><br>Due to the nature of the product, 		document.querySelector(".js-toggle-company-visibility").addEventListener("click", () => {
			hideFooterContent(document.querySelector(".js-policies-content"));
			hideFooterContent(document.querySelector(".js-contact-content"));
			if (document.querySelector(".js-company-content").classList.contains("show")) {
				hideFooterContent(document.querySelector(".js-company-content"));
			} else {
				showFooterContent(document.querySelector(".js-company-content"));
			}
		});

		document.querySelector(".js-toggle-policies-visibility").addEventListener("click", () => {
			hideFooterContent(document.querySelector(".js-company-content"));
			hideFooterContent(document.querySelector(".js-contact-content"));
			if (document.querySelector(".js-policies-content").classList.contains("show")) {
				hideFooterContent(document.querySelector(".js-policies-content"));
			} else {
				showFooterContent(document.querySelector(".js-policies-content"));
			}
		});

		document.querySelector(".js-toggle-contact-visibility").addEventListener("click", () => {
			hideFooterContent(document.querySelector(".js-company-content"));
			hideFooterContent(document.querySelector(".js-policies-content"));
			if (document.querySelector(".js-contact-content").classList.contains("show")) {
				hideFooterContent(document.querySelector(".js-contact-content"));
			} else {
				showFooterContent(document.querySelector(".js-contact-content"));
			}
		});

		function showFooterContent(elem) {
			elem.classList.add("show");
			elem.style.maxHeight = elem.scrollHeight + "px";
		}

		function hideFooterContent(elem) {
			elem.style.maxHeight = "0px";
			elem.classList.remove("show");
		}
	}, 500);
</script></zh-spot><!----><!----><!----></div><div class="footer-component__legal-address-spot"><zh-spot ngskiphydration="true" class="ng2_legal_address"><!-- BEGIN API SPOT=ZH4_ESpot_NG2_Legal_Address --><!----><!----><!-- END API SPOT=ZH4_ESpot_NG2_Legal_Address --></zh-spot></div><div class="footer-component__footer-country-sel ng-star-inserted"><div class="country-lang-selector"><a href="javascript:void(0)" zhkeyboardclick="" tabindex="0" class="language" role="button"><span class="icon icon-sphere" aria-label="Language"></span> United States of America / English </a></div></div><!----></div><!----></zh-footer></footer><!----></section><div _ngcontent-serverapp-c1703335578="" class="widgets-container ng-tns-c1703335578-0 ng-star-inserted chat-active"><zh-accessibility-widget _ngcontent-serverapp-c1703335578="" class="widgets-container__accessibility ng-tns-c1703335578-0 ng-star-inserted"><div accesskey="m" id="accessibility-widget" class="accessibility-widget chat-visible ng-star-inserted" style="touch-action: none; class="ot-desc-cntr" id="ot-tab-desc" tabindex="0" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="ot-pvcy-hdr"><h4 id="ot-pvcy-hdr">Your Privacy</h4><p id="ot-pc-desc" class="ot-grp-desc">When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer.
            <br><a href="https://cookiepedia.co.uk/giving-consent-to-cookies" class="privacy-notice-link" rel="noopener" target="_blank" aria-label="More information about your privacy, opens in a new tab">More information</a></p></div><div class="ot-desc-cntr ot-hide ot-always-active-group" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0" id="ot-desc-id-C0001"><div class="ot-grp-hdr1"><h4 class="ot-cat-header">Strictly necessary cookies</h4><div class="ot-tgl-cntr"><div class="ot-always-active">Always Active</div></div></div><p class="ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc">These cookies are necessary for the correct functioning of the Platform, and they cannot be deactivated on our systems. Generally speaking, they are configured to respond to actions made by you when requesting services, such as adjusting your privacy preferences, logging in to your account or filling out forms. You can configure your browser to block these cookies or alert you when they are present; however, some parts of the platform will not work without them.</p><div class="ot-hlst-cntr"><button class="ot-link-btn category-host-list-handler" aria-label="Cookie Details button opens Cookie List menu" data-parent-id="C0001">Cookies Details&lrm;</button></div></div><div class="ot-desc-cntr ot-hide" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0" id="ot-desc-id-C0002"><div class="ot-grp-hdr1"><h4 class="ot-cat-header">Analysis cookies</h4><div class="ot-tgl"><input type="checkbox" name="ot-group-id-C0002" id="ot-group-id-C0002" role="switch" class="category-switch-handler" data-optanongroupid="C0002" checked="" aria-labelledby="ot-header-id-C0002"> <label class="ot-switch" for="ot-group-id-C0002"><span class="ot-switch-nob" aria-checked="true" role="switch" aria-label="Analysis cookies"></span> <span class="ot-label-txt">Analysis cookies</span></label> </div><div class="ot-tgl-cntr"></div></div><p class="ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc">These cookies allow us to analyze the number of visits and sources of traffic in order to measure and improve the performance of our Platform. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular, and how many people visit the website. If you do not allow these cookies, we will not know when you visited our Platform.
To turn these cookies on or off toggle the button above. "Active" means these cookies can be used. "Inactive" means these cookies cannot be used.</p><div class="ot-hlst-cntr"><button class="ot-link-btn category-host-list-handler" aria-label="Cookie Details button opens Cookie List menu" data-parent-id="C0002">Cookies Details&lrm;</button></div></div><div class="ot-desc-cntr ot-hide" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0" id="ot-desc-id-C0003"><div class="ot-grp-hdr1"><h4 class="ot-cat-header">Functionality or customisation cookies</h4><div class="ot-tgl"><input type="checkbox" name="ot-group-id-C0003" id="ot-group-id-C0003" role="switch" class="category-switch-handler" data-optanongroupid="C0003" checked="" aria-labelledby="ot-header-id-C0003"> <label class="ot-switch" for="ot-group-id-C0003"><span class="ot-switch-nob" aria-checked="true" role="switch" aria-label="Functionality or customisation cookies"></span> <span class="ot-label-txt">Functionality or customisation cookies</span></label> </div><div class="ot-tgl-cntr"></div></div><p class="ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc">These cookies enhance the functionality and personalisation of the Platform. They can be put in place by us or by third parties whose services we have incorporated into our pages. If you do not allow these cookies, some of our services will not function properly.
To turn these cookies on or off toggle the button above. "Active" means these cookies can be used. "Inactive" means these cookies cannot be used.</p><div class="ot-hlst-cntr"><button class="ot-link-btn category-host-list-handler" aria-label="Cookie Details button opens Cookie List menu" data-parent-id="C0003">Cookies Details&lrm;</button></div></div><div class="ot-desc-cntr ot-hide" role="tabpanel" tabindex="0" id="ot-desc-id-C0004"><div class="ot-grp-hdr1"><h4 class="ot-cat-header">Cross-Contextual Behavioral Advertising Cookies</h4><div class="ot-tgl"><input type="checkbox" name="ot-group-id-C0004" id="ot-group-id-C0004" role="switch" class="category-switch-handler" data-optanongroupid="C0004" checked="" aria-labelledby="ot-header-id-C0004"> <label class="ot-switch" for="ot-group-id-C0004"><span class="ot-switch-nob" aria-checked="true" role="switch" aria-label="Cross-Contextual Behavioral Advertising Cookies"></span> <span class="ot-label-txt">Cross-Contextual Behavioral Advertising Cookies</span></label> </div><div class="ot-tgl-cntr"></div></div><p class="ot-grp-desc ot-category-desc">These cookies are put in place by our advertising partners and can be present throughout the entire platform. Said third parties may use them to create a profile of your interests and show you relevant advertising on other websites. If you do not allow these cookies, you may receive less targeted advertising.
To turn these cookies on or off toggle the button above. "Active" means these cookies can be used. "Inactive" means these cookies cannot be used.</p><div class="ot-hlst-cntr"><button class="ot-link-btn category-host-list-handler" aria-label="Cookie Details button opens Cookie List menu" data-parent-id="C0004">Cookies Details&lrm;</button></div></div></div></div></div><!-- Vendors / Hosts --><section id="ot-pc-lst" class="ot-hide ot-pc-scrollbar ot-enbl-chr"><div class="ot-lst-cntr ot-pc-scrollbar"><div id="ot-pc-hdr"><div id="ot-lst-title"><button class="ot-link-btn back-btn-handler" aria-label="Back"><svg id="ot-back-arw" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" x="0px" y="0px" viewBox="0 0 444.531 444.531" xml:space="preserve"><title>Back Button</title><g><path fill="#656565" d="M213.13,222.409L351.88,83.653c7.05-7.043,10.567-15.657,10.567-25.841c0-10.183-3.518-18.793-10.567-25.835
